name: New Year Black Eyed Peas
author: MAYAESR
summary: A delicious New Year's Eve recipe to bring you luck in the new year! I sometimes just use the ham bone and some of the surrounding meat from the traditional Christmas ham that I make each year, but the ham hocks also add a nice, smokey, rustic flavor of their own.
directions: Place the black-eyed peas into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand 8 hours to overnight
In a large stock pot over medium heat, cook and stir onion and garlic in olive oil until onion becomes translucent, about 5 minutes
Pour in the chicken broth and 8 cups water, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to a simmer
Stir in soaked black-eyed peas, ham hocks, tomatoes, pepperoncini, bay leaf, garlic powder, thyme, and salt and pepper
Cover and simmer until peas are tender, ham meat is falling off the bones, and the broth is thickened, about 3 hours
